Issue.creator: tongliofcary
Issue.summary: ccenv:latest removal from docker hub caused problem for chaincode instantiation
Issue.description: for fabric 1.4.1 and 1.4.2, when chaincode gets instantiated, peer will ask for container image hyperledger/fabric-ccenv:latest, when this image gets removed from docker hub, chaincode instantiation will fail because there is no such image available for pulling.
